data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Brighton in the half of Man Utd.
Ball safe as Man Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 9, Brighton have a dangerous throw-in.
Brighton drive into the zone and Leandro Trossard is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Brighton are coming forward and Neal Maupay gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 10, It's a goal kick for the away team in Falmer.
Man Utd to take a throw-in in Brighton territory.
Brighton drive upfield and Neal Maupay gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Man Utd defender.
In the minute 13, Brighton are in shooting range from this free kick.
Chris Kavanagh signals a Brighton throw-in in Man Utd's half.
In Falmer a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 16, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Brighton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mason Greenwood for Man Utd gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Brighton goal kick.
Free kick for Man Utd in the half of Brighton.
Chris Kavanagh awards Brighton a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Can Brighton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Man Utd's half?
Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
Leandro Trossard hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Brighton!
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Man Utd at American Express Community Stadium.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Brighton.
In the minute 22, Chris Kavanagh signals a throw-in for Brighton, close to Man Utd's area.
Bruno Fernandes is booked for the away team.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
In Falmer Brighton attack through Aaron Connolly. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 25, Man Utd have a goal kick.
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Man Utd.
In the minute 28, Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Brighton in their own half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Brighton.
Brighton push forward at American Express Community Stadium and Adam Webster gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Man Utd defence.
In the minute 30, Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Man Utd.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 32, Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
Chris Kavanagh blows against Man Utd's Marcus Rashford for offside.
Brighton to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
In the minute 34, In Falmer a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
Man Utd have a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
An attacking Brighton player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 40, Neal Maupay nets and Brighton now lead 1-0. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Free kick for Brighton in the half of Man Utd.
Nemanja Matic (Man Utd) has received a yellow card from Chris Kavanagh.
In the minute 42, Brighton will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Man Utd.
Brighton's Leandro Trossard has been booked in Falmer.
An unfortunate own goal by Lewis Dunk makes the score 1-1.
In the minute 44, Chris Kavanagh signals a Man Utd throw-in in Brighton's half.
Man Utd's Nemanja Matic gets in a shot on goal at American Express Community Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Brighton in their own half.
In the minute 45, Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Brighton in their own half.
Chris Kavanagh will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Free kick Brighton.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
The first-half is over at American Express Community Stadium.
The second-half is underway in Falmer.
In the minute 46, Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 50, Chris Kavanagh awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Man Utd at American Express Community Stadium.
Marcus Rashford for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Brighton in their own half.
Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Marcus Rashford.
Bruno Fernandes with an assist there.
In the minute 57, Goal kick for Brighton at American Express Community Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Falmer.
Free kick for Brighton in the half of Man Utd.
In the minute 61, Brighton are on the attack at American Express Community Stadium, where Solly March is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
Ball goes out of play for a Man Utd goal kick.
Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 62, Chris Kavanagh awards the away team a throw-in.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 65, Brighton drive forward but Aaron Connolly is judged offside.
The away team have replaced Paul Pogba with Fred. This is the first substitution made today by Ole Gunnar Solskjaer.
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Throw-in Brighton.
Throw-in for Brighton in the half of Man Utd.
Neal Maupay of Brighton smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 69, Brighton to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
Man Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
In the minute 72, Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Brighton in their own half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Man Utd.
In the minute 74, At American Express Community Stadium, Ben White has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 75, Important block from the Brighton defence as Anthony Martial fires in a strike for Man Utd.
Pascal Gross is replacing Adam Lallana for the home team.
Graham Potter is making the team's second substitution at American Express Community Stadium with Alireza Jahanbakhsh replacing Aaron Connolly.
Marcus Rashford (Man Utd) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Brighton at American Express Community Stadium.
In the minute 76, Leandro Trossard (Brighton) strikes – and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
Solly March of Brighton gets in a strike, but is off target.
Chris Kavanagh awards Man Utd a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Brighton's Pascal Gross gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Man Utd defender.
Brighton push forward at American Express Community Stadium and Solly March gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Man Utd defence.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Man Utd in the half of Brighton.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
Lewis Dunk for Brighton has been booked by Chris Kavanagh and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 83, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer (Man Utd) is making a second substitution, with Eric Bailly replacing Mason Greenwood.
In Falmer Man Utd's Anthony Martial is caught offside.
Brighton's Solly March breaks free at American Express Community Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 85, Chris Kavanagh awards Man Utd a goal kick.
Chris Kavanagh signals a Brighton throw-in in Man Utd's half.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
In the minute 88, Lewis Dunk's header is off-target for Brighton.
Man Utd have a goal kick.
Free kick Brighton.
In the minute 89, Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Falmer.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
Alireza Jahanbakhsh (Brighton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Falmer Brighton drive forward through Leandro Trossard. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Marcus Rashford for Man Utd is whistled offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Falmer, Donny van de Beek of Man Utd is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Man Utd.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-3.
Donny van de Beek is replacing Anthony Martial for Man Utd at American Express Community Stadium.
Solly March equalizes with a header to make it 2-2.
Adam Webster instrumental with a fine assist.
Bruno Fernandes smashes in a penalty at American Express Community Stadium. The score is now 2-3.
